thread.title: Zijin's Bioleaching Technology Reaches the World's Leading Level (Zijin Mining Group Company Ltd)
thread.title_full: Zijin's Bioleaching Technology Reaches the World's Leading Level (Zijin Mining Group Company Ltd) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Zijin's Bioleaching Technology Reaches the World's Leading Level (Zijin Mining Group Company Ltd)
text: ( Source : Zijin Mining Group Company Ltd) Recently , China Nonferrous Metals Industry Association rated Zijin's green and sustainable bioleaching technology for low-grade copper mines and its industrial application as world's leading level.
